articles.description: There have been roughly 6000 tournament rounds at the Honda Classic since 2007. None were better than that of Matt Jones, the world No.83, in Thursday’s opener.
articles.content: Russell Henley and Aaron Wise were each six-under after their opening rounds, those 64s matching the best score at the Honda by anyone Jones excluded since Rory McIlroy and Russell Knox each had 63s … [+2105 chars]

articles.title: Bellamy calls on senior Storm players to step up, concedes team is ‘still learning’ with no Smith - Fox Sports
articles.description: Melbourne Storm coach Craig Bellamy has called on his senior players to step up and fill the void left by champion skipper Cameron Smith.
articles.content:
Despite going down to the Eels, Bellamy was relatively happy with his teams performance on Thursday. However, he conceded that they missed Smiths experience out there.
